dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October 1954
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Comments on a potpourri of events--Halloween costumes of the saints, hurricane Carol, pacifist conference, and irritations while saying the community rosary.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 238 1954-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
